apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts a tender kiss between a woman with a medium-dark skin tone and a man whose skin tone is not specified, suggesting a universal representation. The characters are rendered with Apple's signature soft rounded edges and gentle shading, conveying a sense of intimacy and affection.  The subtle blush on their cheeks and the slight tilt of their heads, characteristic of Apple's expressive designs, evoke romantic feelings and loving connections in digital communication.
